00027 #ifndef DYNAMIC_REIFY_TRUE_OLD_H
00028 #define DYNAMIC_REIFY_TRUE_OLD_H
00029 
00030 #include "../constraints/constraint_abstract.h"
00031 #include "../minion.h"
00032 
00033 #ifdef P
00034 #undef P
00035 #endif
00036 
00037 //#define P(x) cout << x << endl
00038 #define P(x)
00039 
00040 template<typename BoolVar>
00041 struct Dynamic_reify_true_old: public AbstractConstraint
00042 {
00043         virtual string constraint_name()
00044         { return "DynamicReifyTrue:" + poscon->constraint_name(); }
00045 
00046         AbstractConstraint* poscon;
00047         BoolVar rar_var;
00048         bool constraint_locked;
00049 
00050         Reversible<bool> full_propagate_called;
00051 
00052         Dynamic_reify_true_old(StateObj* _stateObj, AbstractConstraint* _poscon, BoolVar v) :
00053                 AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), poscon(_poscon), rar_var(v),
00054                                 constraint_locked(false), full_propagate_called(stateObj, false)
00055         { }
00056 
00057         virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00058         {
00059                 DomainInt back_val = *(v + v_size - 1);
00060                 if (back_val != 0)
00061                         return poscon->check_assignment(v, v_size - 1);
00062                 else
00063                         return true;
00064         }
00065 
00066         virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00067         {
00068                 vector<AnyVarRef> vec = poscon->get_vars();
00069                 vec.push_back(rar_var);
00070                 return vec;
00071         }
00072 
00073         virtual int dynamic_trigger_count()
00074         { return 1 + poscon->get_vars_singleton()->size(); }
00075 
00076         // Override setup!
00077         virtual void setup()
00078         {
00079                 AbstractConstraint::setup();
00080 
00081                 poscon->setup();
00082                 DynamicTrigger* start = poscon->dynamic_trigger_start();
00083                 int trigs = poscon->dynamic_trigger_count();
00084 
00085                 for (int i = 0; i < trigs; ++i)
00086                         (start + i)->constraint = this;
00087         }
00088 
00089         virtual void special_check()
00090         {
00091                 D_ASSERT(constraint_locked);
00092                 constraint_locked = false;
00093                 poscon->full_propagate();
00094                 full_propagate_called = true;
00095         }
00096 
00097         virtual void special_unlock()
00098         {
00099                 D_ASSERT(constraint_locked);
00100                 constraint_locked = false;
00101         }
00102 
00103         virtual void propagate(DynamicTrigger* trig)
00104         {
00105                 PROP_INFO_ADDONE(ReifyTrue);
00106                 P("ReifyImply Prop");
00107 
00108                 if (constraint_locked)
00109                         return;
00110 
00111                 DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start();
00112                 DynamicTrigger* assign_trigs = dt + 1;
00113 
00114                 P("Trigger: " << trig - dt);
00115 
00116                 if (trig == dt)
00117                 {
00118                         D_ASSERT(rar_var.isAssigned() && rar_var.getAssignedValue() == 1);
00119                         constraint_locked = true;
00120                         getQueue(stateObj).pushSpecialTrigger(this);
00121                         return;
00122                 }
00123 
00124                 if (trig >= assign_trigs && trig < dt + dynamic_trigger_count())
00125                 {// Lost assignment
00126                         if (!full_propagate_called)
00127                         {
00128                                 bool flag;
00129                                 GET_ASSIGNMENT(assignment, poscon);
00130 
00131                                 if (!flag)
00132                                 { // No satisfying assignment to constraint
00133                                         rar_var.propagateAssign(0);
00134                                         return;
00135                                 }
00136 
00137                                 vector<AnyVarRef>& poscon_vars =
00138                                                 *(poscon->get_vars_singleton());
00139 
00140                                 for (int i = 0; i < assignment.size(); ++i)
00141                                 {
00142                                         D_ASSERT(poscon_vars[assignment[i].first].inDomain(assignment[i].second));
00143                                         if (poscon_vars[assignment[i].first].isBound())
00144                                         {
00145                                                 poscon_vars[assignment[i].first].addDynamicTrigger(assign_trigs + i, DomainChanged);
00146                                         }
00147                                         else
00148                                         {
00149                                                 poscon_vars[assignment[i].first].addDynamicTrigger(assign_trigs + i, DomainRemoval,
00150                                                                 assignment[i].second);
00151                                         }
00152                                 }
00153                         }
00154                         return;
00155                 }
00156 
00157                 if (full_propagate_called)
00158                 {
00159                         D_ASSERT(rar_var.isAssigned() && rar_var.getAssignedValue() == 1);
00160                         poscon->propagate(trig);
00161                 }
00162                 else
00163                 {
00164                         // This is an optimisation.
00165                         releaseTrigger(stateObj, trig);
00166                 }
00167         }
00168 
00169         virtual void full_propagate()
00170         {
00171                 P("Reifyimply FullProp");
00172                 DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start();
00173                 DynamicTrigger* assign_trigs = dt + 1;
00174                 int dt_count = dynamic_trigger_count();
00175                 // Clean up triggers
00176                 for (int i = 0; i < dt_count; ++i)
00177                         releaseTrigger(stateObj, dt + i);
00178 
00179                 rar_var.addDynamicTrigger(dt, LowerBound);
00180                 bool flag;
00181                 GET_ASSIGNMENT(assignment, poscon);
00182 
00183                 if (!flag)
00184                 { // No satisfying assignment to constraint
00185                         cout << "Found no satisfying assignment!" << endl;
00186                         rar_var.propagateAssign(0);
00187                         return;
00188                 }
00189 
00190                 vector<AnyVarRef>& poscon_vars = *(poscon->get_vars_singleton());
00191 
00192                 for (int i = 0; i < assignment.size(); ++i)
00193                 {
00194                         D_ASSERT(poscon_vars[assignment[i].first].inDomain(assignment[i].second));
00195                         if (poscon_vars[assignment[i].first].isBound())
00196                         {
00197                                 poscon_vars[assignment[i].first].addDynamicTrigger(assign_trigs
00198                                                 + i, DomainChanged);
00199                         }
00200                         else
00201                         {
00202                                 poscon_vars[assignment[i].first].addDynamicTrigger(assign_trigs
00203                                                 + i, DomainRemoval, assignment[i].second);
00204                         }
00205                 }
00206                 if (rar_var.isAssigned() && rar_var.getAssignedValue() > 0)
00207                 {
00208                         poscon->full_propagate();
00209                         full_propagate_called = true;
00210                 }
00211         }
00212 };
00213 
00214 // Just a placeholder.
00215 template<typename BoolVar>
00216 AbstractConstraint*
00217 truereifyConDynamicOld(StateObj* stateObj, AbstractConstraint* c, BoolVar var)
00218 { return new Dynamic_reify_true_old<BoolVar> (stateObj, &*c, var); }
00219 
00220 #endif
